Johann Sebastian Bach

Concerto in D major after Antonio Vivaldi, BWV 972

1713–1714

[Wikipedia] · [IMSLP]

Total duration: 8' 30"

  • 1.
  • 2. Larghetto
  • 3. Allegro

This is an arrangement of a violin concerto by Antonio Vivaldi (RV 230; op. 3 no. 9). The Neue Bach-Ausgabe gives the arrangement in two versions (BWV3 972.1 and BWV3 972.2) that have only minor differences.

Recommended editions

  • Neue Bach-Ausgabe (Bärenreiter) · V, 11 · BA 5088-01 · Bearbeitungen fremder Werke · ed. Karl Heller [both versions]
  • Bärenreiter · BA 5221 · Klavierbearbeitungen fremder Werke I · ed. Karl Heller [second version]
  • Bärenreiter · BA 5223 · Klavierbearbeitungen fremder Werke III · ed. Karl Heller [first version]
